name: Deceiving Death
description:
You have access to a different selection of spells/abilities, which can be used to both fight enemies and moving inside the world and reach hidden areas.

Try to collect all the stars achieving the maximum score to challenge your dexterity

It supports PS/Xbox controller (warmly suggested)

Follow my Facebook page to get more updates and discuss the development of this game https://www.facebook.com/OptimansGames-1904307412997029

Tell me what do you think about the overall experience. I'm open to critics and discussion

Enjoy!
